spells.name: Living Steel
spells.description:
The target's Melee Attacks gains +1 to hit and Magical Attacks .
No model or unit can be affected by more than one instance of this spell simultaneously.

spells.description: The target suffers -1 Arm and gains Metal Armour.

spells.description:
Place a Wall Terrain Feature with dimensions 1√ó6" anywhere on the target.
Remove the Terrain Feature when the spell ends.

spells.description:
All hits are resolved with Str 6, AP 2, Lightning Attacks, and Magical Attacks. The target suffers 3 hits. Before resolving hits, apply [ùõº]
[ùõº]: The target suffers 1 additional hit
[ùõΩ]: Select a new Unengaged enemy unit within 6" of the target: it suffers 2 hits. Before resolving hits, select a third Unengaged enemy unit within 6" of the second unit to suffer 1 hit.

spells.name: Foresight
spells.description:
The target gains +2 Def and +2 Off.
No model can be affected by more than one instance of this spell simultaneously.

spells.name: Chance of Redemption
spells.description:
The target gains Divine Attacks.
In addition it may immediately perform a 5" Magical Move.

spells.name: The Stars Align
spells.description: The target's Melee Attacks must reroll failed to-hit rolls.

spells.name: Fate's Judgement
spells.description: The target suffers 2D3+1 hits with AP 1 and Magical Attacks. These hits are set to wound on 6+ and gain a +1 to wound for each friendly turn before the current one. E.g. in the fourth Magic Phase it wounds on 3+.

spells.name: Augury of Despair
spells.description: The target suffers -1 Off and -1 Agi (to a minimum of 1).

spells.name: Inescapable Doom
spells.description:
Immediately when the spell is cast and at the start of each of the Caster's subsequent Magic Phases, the target suffers 1 hit that wounds automatically with AP 10 and Magical Attacks.
No model can be affected by more than one instance of this spell simultaneously.

spells.name: Fountain of Youth
spells.description:
Raise 1 HP in the target's Health Pool.

No model can Raise more than 1 HP per turn from this spell.

spells.name: Entwining Roots
spells.description:
The target suffers -2" Cha and -2" Mob, both to a minimum of 2".
In addition the target suffers -2 Agi to a minimum of 1.

spells.name: Veil of Mist
spells.description: All units within 12" of the target suffer - 1 to hit with Shooting Attacks and a - 1 modifier to their Casting Rolls.

spells.name: Shower of Rocks
spells.description: The target suffers 2D3+1 hits with Str 3, AP 1, and Magical Attacks. If the target contains a Rank-and-File model with Light Troops, these hits are instead resolved with Str 4, AP 2, and Magical Attacks.

spells.name: Stone Skin
spells.description: The target gains +1 Res. In addition, Melee Attacks allocated towards it never wound on better than 4+.

spells.name: Quicksand
spells.description: The target suffers - 1 to-hit with its Melee Attacks. The first time in each Player Turn that it performs a Move (See Definitions and Terminology Chapter), each of its Health Pools must take a Dangerous Terrain(6+) Test.

spells.name: Whispers of the Veil
spells.description:
The target suffers -1 Res.

No model can be affected by more than one instance of this spell simultaneously.

spells.name: Danse Macabre
spells.description: The target gains Dying Blow, Ghost Step.  In addition, it may immediately perform a  5" Magical Move.

spells.name: Chorus of the Damned
spells.description: The target gains Distracting(1), Horror.

spells.name: Touch of the Reaper
spells.description:
The target suffers D3+1 hits with Str 9, AP 10, and Magical Attacks.
When rolling to wound with this attack, substitute the target's Cou for its Res.

spells.name: Spectral Blades
spells.description: Standard Melee Attacks from Rank-and-File models in the target have their Str and AP set to at least 4 and gain Magical Attacks.

spells.name: Soul Blight
spells.description:
The target suffer 2D3+1 hits with Str 9, AP 10, and Magical Attacks.
When rolling to wound with this attack, substitute the target's Cou for its Res.

spells.name: The Devouring Dark
spells.description: The target suffers a hit with Area Attack(2√ó2), Str 5, AP 2, and Magical Attacks.

spells.name: Hand of Glory
spells.description:
The target gains Aegis(6+) and Aegis(+1, max. 3+).

The Sacrifice may be performed for this spell.

spells.name: Blood Curse
spells.description:
The target suffers -1 Str and -1 AP.

The Sacrifice may be performed for this spell.

spells.name: Pentagram of Pain
spells.description:
The target suffers 3 hits with Str 5, AP 2, and Magical Attacks.
If one or more unsaved wounds are caused by this spell, the Caster of the spell Recovers 1 HP.

The Sacrifice may be performed for this spell.

spells.name: Umbral Majesty
spells.description:
Choose a single model part in the target unit when casting the spell. This model part gains (Grind Attack(6, Str 5, AP 2)).

The Sacrifice may be performed for this spell.

spells.name: The Grave Calls
spells.description:
The target suffers 8 hits with Str 5, AP 2, and Magical Attacks.

The Sacrifice may be performed for this spell.

spells.description:
The target suffers 2D3+1 
	hits with Str 4, AP 0, Flaming Attacks, Magical Attacks,

spells.name: Flaming Swords
spells.description: The target gains +1 to wound, Magical Attacks (Melee & Shooting), Flaming Attacks (Melee & Shooting).

spells.name: Dragon's Roar
spells.description: Choose a single model part in the target unit when casting the spell. This model part gains Breath Attack(Str 4, AP 0, Flaming Attacks, Magical Attacks) and Grind Attack(2D6, Str 4, AP 0, Flaming Attacks, Magical Attacks).

spells.name: Pyroclastic Flow
spells.description:
The target suffers 5D3 
	hits with Str 4, AP 0, Flaming Attacks, Magical Attacks,
.

spells.name: Pillars of Fire
spells.description: Standard Melee Attacks from Rank-and-File models in the target hit automatically, have their Str always set to 4, and AP always set to 0, and gain Flaming Attacks,Magical Attacks.

spells.name: Cage of Embers
spells.description:
The target gains Weakness(Flaming Attacks).
Immediately when the spell is cast, it suffers 2D3 hits with Str 4, AP 0, and Magical Attacks.
In addition, whenever the target moves (see Definition and Terminolog Chapter), it suffers 2D3 hits with Str 4, AP 0, Flaming Attacks, Magical Attacks, .

spells.name: Predator's Instinct
spells.description:
The target gains +2" Cha and Resistance(Ranged Attacks).

No model can be affected by more than one instance of this spell simultaneously.

spells.name: Savage Fury
spells.description: The target gains Fury,Fearless,Unruly,Frenzy. In addition, the target can never be wounded on better than 3+

spells.name: Awaken the Beast
spells.description: The target gains +1 Str and +1 AP.

spells.name: Swarm of Insects
spells.description:
Immediately when the spell is cast, the target suffers 5D6 hits with AP 0 and Magical Attacks. These hits always wound on 6+.
In addition, it suffers -1 to hit with Shooting Attacks.

spells.name: Wild Spikes
spells.description: Choose a single model part in the target unit when casting the spell. This model part gains Grind Attack(4, Str 6, AP 3)

spells.name: Totemic Summon
spells.description: Summon a Totemic Beast (profile below), which is immediately placed on the Battlefield using the rules for Ambush(Board Edge).

spells.name: Smite the Unbeliever
spells.description:
The target suffers D6 hits with Str 5, AP 2, and Magical Attacks.
  • : These hits are instead resolved with Str 7, AP 2, and Magical Attacks.
  • : These hits are instead resolved with Str 3, AP 2, and Magical Attacks.

spells.name: Light of Faith
spells.description:
The target counts as having one fewer Proper Ranks when Engaged.
  • : Two fewer Proper Ranks instead
  • : Spell has no effect

spells.name: Weight of Judgement
spells.description:
The target suffers -2 Agi to a minimum of 1.
  • : -3 Agi instead
  • : -1 Agiinstead

spells.name: Holy Affliction
spells.description:
The target suffers -1 to wound.
  • : The target suffers -1 AP.
  • : The target gains +1 AP.

spells.name: Wrath of God
spells.description:
Place a marker on the target point. You must roll for Divine Intervention at the start of each subsequent Magic Phase.
  • : Each unit within 2D6" of the centre of the marker suffers 2D6 with Str 5, AP 2, and Magical Attacks. Then remove the marker.
  • : The opponent may move the marker up to 3" in any direction.

spells.name: Rain of Fire
spells.description:
The target suffers D3+1 hits. All other units within 3" of the target suffer 1 hit.
All hits are resolved with Str 9, AP 4, Magical Attacks,Flaming Attacks,.
  • : Increase the number of hits each unit suffers by 1.
  • : Decrease the number of hits each unit suffers by 1.

spells.name: Evil Eye
spells.description:
The target suffers -1 Cha and -1 Mob, both to a minimum of 3 and -1 Agi to a minimum of 1 .

No model can be affected by more than one instance of this spell simultaneously.

spells.name: Soured Luck
spells.description: Melee Attacks against the target are set to hit on at least 3+ .

spells.name: Illusory Paths
spells.description:
Choose which effect to apply when casting the spell:
  • The target gains Random Movement(2D6").
  • The target gains Random Movement(3D6").

spells.name: Cauldron's Curse
spells.description: The target gains Weakness(Ranged Attacks).

spells.name: Clouded Sight
spells.description: The target cannot draw Line of Sight to a target more than 12" away from it.

spells.name: Mists of Invisibility
spells.description:
Mark the ground under the centre of the target. The target gains Ambush(within 12" of the marked point) then it is immediatly removed from the Battlefield. It automatically passes the roll to return to the Battlefield in the next friendly Player Turn.
*Cannot target Shaken units

spells.name: The Dead Arise
spells.description: Summon a Skeletons or Zombies unit. Declare which when selecting the target for the spell. The unit has a number of Health Points corresponding to the Rsr value of the unit. All models must be placed within the spell‚Äôs Range, with at least one model touching the target point.

spells.name: Echoes of the Dark Forest
spells.description: The target gains Fearless. In addition, it may immediately perform a 5" Magical Move. This spell may target units in Ambush. If so, the target unit immediately enters the Battlefied following normal Ambush rules, instead of performing a Magical Move.

spells.name: Black Wing Totem
spells.description: The target gains  +2" Cha and +3 Agi.

spells.name: Blooded Horn Totem
spells.description: The target gains +1 Att and +2 AP.

spells.name: Clouded Eye Totem
spells.description: The target gains Hard Target(1) and Magic Resistance(3).

spells.name: Gnarled Hide Totem
spells.description: The target gains +1 Arm and Distracting(1).

spells.name: Rune of Revocation
spells.description: Ignore all other spell effects on the target from spells with Duration: One Turn. The target unit gains Magic Resistance(2), which is also applied to friendly spells.

spells.name: Rune of Reckoning
spells.description: Friendly models in the target unit gain Hatred(Melee). Melee Attacks by friendly models towards the target gain Hatred.

spells.name: Rune of Oaths
spells.description: Friendly models in the target unit gain Zeal(Melee). Melee Attacks by friendly models towards the target gain Zeal.

spells.name: Rune of Resolve
spells.description:
The target gains Swiftstride, and until the end of the Player Turn it also gains Light Troops.
In addition, the target may perform a 4" Magical Move

spells.name: Rune of Gleaming
spells.description: The target gains Distracting(1),Hard Target(1).

spells.name: Rune of Resilience
spells.description: To-wound rolls against the target suffer a -1 modifier.

spells.name: Frostbite
spells.description: If this spell targets a friendly unit, the target gains +1 Armour. If this spell targets an enemy unit, the target suffers -1 Armour. {This spell may target two units instead of one (declare the additional target before the Casting Attempt).}

spells.name: Astral Union
spells.description: The target gains Regeneration(6+) and Regeneration(+1, max. 3+).

spells.name: Arise!
spells.description:
Choose one of the following effects when resolving the spell*:
  • The Rank-and-File part of the target Raises HP equal to its Resurrected value.
  • An Attachable Model in the target Recovers HP equal to its Resurrected value.
Height 4--5 models with Exclusive, and Attachable Models cannot Recover more than 2 HP from this spell each Magic Phase.

spells.name: Hellfire
spells.description:
The target suffers 2D6 hits with Strength 6, Armour Penetration 0, and Magical Attacks.

*This spell can target units Engaged in Combat and in contact with the Caster's Front Facing.

spells.name: Guile and Fury
spells.description:
Can be cast in one of two versions: Augment: Cannot be cast by a Goblin. The target gains +1 to hit, and its Charge Range, Flee Distance, and Pursuit Distance are all increased by 1".

Hex: Cannot be cast by an Orc. The target suffers -1 to hit, and its Charge Range, Flee Distance, and Pursuit Distance are reduced by 1".

alt.description: Cannot be cast by Orc Shamans. The target suffers ‚àí1 to hit, and its Charge Range, Flee Distance, and Pursuit Distance are reduced by 1‚Ä≥

spells.name: Forest Embrace
spells.description:
Place a Forest* underneath the target. This Forest always extends to the edges of the target's Unit Boundary (even if the unit moves or changes formation).

* You may place a marker next to the unit instead

spells.name: Chains of Pride
spells.description: The target gains Unstable and Fearless. {Targets with Supernal cannot take Break Tests.}

spells.name: Tempest of the Storm Witch
spells.description: The target may immediately perform a 12" Magical Move and loses Scoring. {In addition, the target gains Coastal Predator.}

spells.name: Spear of Infinity
spells.description:
The target suffers 1 hit with Strength 2 [5], Armour Penetration 2, Area Attack(1√ó5), and [Multiple Wounds (2)].
The hits from Spear of Infinity gain +1 Strength for each other non-Attribute Spell successfully cast in this Magic Phase (including other instances of Spear of Infinity).

spells.name: Curse of the Phantom Queen
spells.description:
Attacks made by the target suffer -1 AP.
Attacks made against the target gain +1 AP.
Attacks from spells are not affected.

spells.name: Favour of Meladys
spells.description:
=1pt The player gains 2 Protection Tokens which are removed when the spell ends. When a friendly unit within 18" of the Caster suffers a wound, after Armour Saves have been taken, before any Special Saves are taken, you may discard a Protection Token and ignore the wound applying the following rules:
  • Rank-and-File models of Height 1 ignore up to 2 wounds per token, provided they are suffered simultaneously.
  • Characters, and models of Height 4 or 5, can each only ignore a single wound per Phase.
  • Wounds from attacks with Multiple Wounds are not ignored, they inflict one less wound instead.

spells.name: Curse of Nezibkesh
spells.description: The target gains Incendiary. In addition, the target suffers -1 Def and -1 Off, and an additional -1 Def and -1 Off, as long as it has 1 or more Incendiary Markers on it.

spells.name: Breath of the Lady
spells.description: Add 2 Blessing Tokens to your Blessing Token pool.

spells.name: Breath of the Steppe
spells.description:
Place a round Tornado Marker with a 3" diameter with its centre on the target point. The Tornado Marker must be placed more than 1" away from any unit. The marker is considered Covering Terrain for units inside and/or behind them that contributes to ‚ü®Soft‚ü© {Hard} Cover.
The Tornado Marker is Dangerous Terrain (‚ü®2‚ü© {3}), even for models with Strider.

spells.name: Children of Umi
spells.description: All Melee Attacks against the target suffer -1 to wound.

spells.name: Duty is Eternal
spells.description: The target gains +1 Res.

spells.name: Iovanis' Thunder
spells.description: The target suffers 2D3 hits with Str 4, AP 1, Lightning Attacks,Magical Attacks, Maniacal Enthusiasm(To-wound roll).

spells.name: Death is Only The Beginning
spells.description:
Choose one of the following effects when resolving the spell*.
  • The Rank-and-File Health Pool of the target Raises HP equal to its Rsr.
  • An Attachable Model in the target Recovers HP equal to its Rsr.
Height 4‚Äì5 models with Exclusive, and Attachable Models, cannot Recover more than 2 HP from this spell in each Magic Phase.
If multiple targets, each target can make a different choice.

spells.name: Unseal the Darkstone
spells.description: The target suffers 2D3 hits with Str 4, AP 1, Lightning Attacks, Magical Attacks, and Maniacal Enthusiasm (Towound roll).

spells.description: The target gains Fearless. The target may perform a 4 5‚Ä≥ Magical Move. This spell may target units in Ambush. If so, the target unit immediately enters the Battlefied following normal Ambush rules.

spells.name: On The Double!
spells.description: The target gains +1‚Ä≥ Advance Rate and +4‚Ä≥ March Rate

spells.name: Ready! Aim! Fire!
spells.description: The target gains Accurate

spells.name: Steady, Men!
spells.description: Discipline Tests taken by the target are subject to MinimisedRoll. A unit that receives this Order and passes a Rally Test doesn't become Shaken, and the Reform that is made after Rallying doesn't prevent the unit from moving and/or shooting (but it still counts as having moved for shooting purposes).

spells.name: Ullor's Blessing
spells.description: The target gains Aegis (5+, against Melee Attacks).

spells.name: Sunna's Blessing
spells.description: The target gains Flaming Attacks. All enemy units in base contact with one or more targets of this spell when the spell is cast suffer D6 hits with Strength 4, Armour Penetration 1, Flaming Attacks, and Magical Attacks.

spells.description: The target's failed to-wound rolls with Melee Attacks must be rerolled.
